Court further observed that, whilst such an  election will  no  doubt  have to  be
made personally  by  the  Accused,  the  decision  so  made  by  the Accused may
nevertheless be conveyed to  Court by  his counsel.
As  I observed,  the  Appellant after  changing his jury  option,  there  had  been
